mapper.select:
SELECT mm.id, mm.name, room_name, online, mm.create_time, link, mm.introduce, mm.update_time, mm.meeting_time, mm.sign_time, user_number, sign_number, mum.state FROM m_meeting mm JOIN m_meeting_room mmr on mmr.meetingid = mm.id JOIN m_user_meeting mum on mm.id = mum.meeting_id JOIN m_user mu on mum.user_id = mu.id JOIN m_room mr on mr.id = mmr.roomid WHERE mu.ID = #{userid} AND mm.DELETED = 0
AND mm.name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingname},'%')
AND mu.username like CONCAT('%',#{host},'%')
AND mr.room_name = #{meetingroom}
select * from m_meeting m JOIN m_user_meeting um ON um.MEETING_ID = m.ID JOIN m_user u ON u.ID = um.USER_ID WHERE m.DELETED = 0
select * from m_meeting m JOIN m_user_meeting um ON um.MEETING_ID = m.ID JOIN m_user u ON u.ID = um.USER_ID WHERE u.ID = #{id} AND um.DELETED = 0 limit #{start},#{end}

SELECT `username`,`nickname`,`sex`,`um_power`,`state`,`start_time`,`end_time`, time_to_sec(timediff(`end_time`,`start_time`)) as `all_time` FROM `m_user_meeting` as um right join `m_user` as u on u.id=um.user_id where um.meeting_id=#{meetingid}
SELECT u.id, u.username, um.start_time, um.state, u.face_url FROM `m_user_meeting` as um right join `m_user` as u on u.id=um.user_id where (um.state=1 OR um.state=2) AND um.meeting_id = #{meetingid}
SELECT u.id, u.username, um.start_time, um.state, u.face_url FROM `m_user_meeting` as um right join `m_user` as u on u.id=um.user_id where um.state=0 AND um.meeting_id = #{meetingid}

SELECT u.id, u.username, um.start_time, um.state, u.face_url FROM `m_user_meeting` as um right join `m_user` as u on u.id=um.user_id where um.state!=0 AND um.meeting_id = #{meetingid}
AND u.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')

SELECT u.id, u.username, um.start_time, um.state, u.face_url FROM `m_user_meeting` as um right join `m_user` as u on u.id=um.user_id where um.state=0 AND um.meeting_id = #{meetingid}
AND u.username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')

SELECT mm.id, mm.name, mu.username as host, room_name, online, mm.create_time, link, mm.introduce, mm.update_time, mm.meeting_time, mm.sign_time, user_number, sign_number, state FROM m_meeting mm JOIN m_meeting_room mmr on mmr.meetingid = mm.id JOIN m_user_meeting mum on mm.id = mum.meeting_id JOIN m_user mu on mum.user_id = mu.id JOIN m_room mr on mr.id = mmr.roomid WHERE mum.um_power = 3 AND mm.DELETED = 0
AND mm.name like CONCAT('%',#{meetingname},'%')
AND mu.username like CONCAT('%',#{host},'%')
AND mr.room_name = #{meetingroom}
